name: Studio Verge
author: studio-verge
description: Studio Verge is a boutique creative agency specializing in digital-first branding and high-converting UX design. We partner with forward-thinking startups and global brands to craft compelling identities and digital experiences that move audiences to action.

services.name: Brand Identity Design
services.description: We create iconic brand identities rooted in strategic positioning, including logo design, typography systems, color palettes, and brand guidelines.

services.name: UX Research & Design
services.description: We run research-driven design sprints to uncover user insights and translate them into wireframes, user flows, and interactive prototypes.

services.name: Content Strategy & Copywriting
services.description: Our team crafts conversion-oriented messaging across digital platforms — from hero taglines to product microcopy — all aligned to your voice and audience.

services.name: Go-to-Market Strategy
services.description: We help brands launch with impact through competitive analysis, audience segmentation, messaging frameworks, and channel strategy.

name: Pixel & Hue
author: pixel-hue
description: Pixel & Hue is a full-service creative agency blending bold strategy with award-winning design. From startups to Fortune 500s, we craft impactful digital experiences that resonate.

services.name: Brand Identity Development
services.description: We create iconic brand identities that stand out in saturated markets. This includes logo design, typography systems, color palettes, and brand guidelines.

services.name: UI Design for Web & Mobile
services.description: Custom user interface design optimized for engagement and conversion. We handle everything from wireframes to high-fidelity prototypes.

services.name: Content Marketing Campaigns
services.description: Data-driven content creation and campaign strategies to grow your brand presence organically across platforms.

services.name: Strategic Brand Positioning
services.description: We work with leadership teams to uncover brand essence, define voice, and develop strategic narratives that connect with core audiences.

name: Studio Northbound
author: northbound-std
description: Studio Northbound is a multidisciplinary creative collective specializing in digital storytelling, user-centered design, and culturally resonant campaigns. We help brands find their voice—and amplify it.

services.name: UX Research & Journey Mapping
services.description: Deep user research and experience mapping to ensure every touchpoint is intuitive, relevant, and delightful.

services.name: Full-Stack Web Development
services.description: Custom websites built with performance, accessibility, and scalability in mind. From React frontends to scalable Node.js backends.

services.name: Explainer Video Production
services.description: Engaging 2D/3D motion graphics that tell your story, explain your product, or promote your campaign with style.

services.name: Integrated Ad Campaigns
services.description: We craft memorable advertising campaigns that span digital, print, and social—built on strategy and driven by results.

name: Halo & Co.
author: halo-co
description: A boutique agency specializing in high-end branding and immersive digital experiences for modern lifestyle brands.

services.name: Luxury Brand Systems
services.description: Designing scalable and luxurious branding systems tailored for premium positioning.

services.name: Website UI Design
services.description: Polished interfaces with a strong focus on usability and high-end aesthetics.

name: Drift Theory
author: drift-theory
description: We help tech startups and disruptors craft stories that cut through the noise—visually and strategically.

services.name: Go-To-Market Playbooks
services.description: We build actionable GTM strategies grounded in audience insight and competitive research.

services.name: UX Optimization Audits
services.description: Conversion-focused audits that improve user flows and engagement.

name: Forge & Form
author: forhe-form
description: Award-winning motion graphics and design studio helping brands make statements that move.

services.name: Explainer Animation
services.description: Crisp, modern motion graphics that simplify your message and elevate your brand.

services.name: Product Launch Visuals
services.description: Launch packages that include 3D visuals, teaser trailers, and animations.

name: Civic & Scale
author: civic-scale
description: A socially conscious agency focused on branding and digital tools for civic, non-profit, and mission-driven orgs.

services.name: Responsive Website Development
services.description: Modern, ADA-compliant websites built for transparency and user accessibility.

name: Signal West
author: signal-west
description: We craft compelling brand experiences for modern eCommerce and lifestyle companies looking to grow online.

services.name: DTC Brand Strategy
services.description: Growth-focused brand development for direct-to-consumer businesses.

services.name: Social Content Calendars
services.description: Monthly content packs with creative captions, graphics, and campaign structure.

name: Arcade & Ivy
author: arcade-ivy
description: Elegant design meets sharp strategy. We help fashion, editorial, and luxury clients create unforgettable digital moments.

services.name: Brand Film Production
services.description: Short-form cinematic films and fashion reels with bespoke art direction.

services.name: Fashion UX/UI Design
services.description: Design tailored for editorial-style eCommerce experiences.

name: Neon North Studio
author: neon-north
description: Vibrant, Gen-Z forward creative agency blending trend-savvy social strategies with bold design and real-time campaigns.

services.name: TikTok Video Production
services.description: Script, shoot, and edit viral-ready TikTok videos for emerging brands.

services.name: UGC Creative Campaigns
services.description: We design campaigns powered by user-generated content and micro-influencers.

services.name: Social-First UX Design
services.description: Web experiences designed for mobile-first audiences and social sharing.
